<S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H935>coming<s%> when <S%H3605>all<s%> that is in your <S%H1004>house,<s%> and all that your fathers have <S%H1>laid<s%> up in <S%H686>store<s%> to <S%H686>this<s%> <S%H2088>day<s%> shall be <S%H3117>carried<s%> to <S%H5375>Babylon;<s%> <S%H894>nothing<s%> <S%H3808><s%> shall be <S%H1697>left,<s%>' <S%H3498>says<s%> the <S%H559>Lord.<s%>
